short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to manage tasks and notes in Salesbuckets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bucket Your Leads for a Smoother Day
Sort your leads into buckets so you know who to hit up first. Say goodbye to wasting time on dead ends and focus on the folks ready to chat.
